description:
'''Caustic''' is an American [[industrial music|industrial]] band based out of [[Madison, Wisconsin]], United States, created in 2002 by DJ Matt Fanale (AKA Eurotic), who is the sole consistent member. The band's live lineup varies quite a bit, largely depending on the location of the show. Caustic's lyrics are typically humorous, while the music itself ranges between older styled industrial and more modern styled [[powernoise]].

Caustic has performed live at a number of international industrial music festivals, including the 2005 and 2006 Providence Industrial Festival and the 2006 Blacksun, Reverence, Indoctrination, and the UK's [[Infest (festival)|Infest]] Festival in 2007.
